items.author: Jerome Granados
items.content:
@aldric yes you can set filters to display only articles for selected categories. 

Install our WordPress plugin http://wordpress.org/plugins/goodbarber/ to have access to this feature.

Some additional information here:
1/ GoodBarber Plugin for WordPress - Friday Talk #7 - YouTube

2/ Friday talk: Content filters

Don't hesitate to get back to us if you need help to set filters on your GoodBarber account.

items.author: Aldric
items.content:
Hi,
Is there a way to display all posts and exclude some categories with the Wordpress connector ?
Thanks
